This game is a soulless husk of what it once was. I do not feel a sense of community, culture, or shared experience when I play this game anymore. I have owned dead by daylight since 2018 and have 2000+ hours played. Throughout that entire time I and all the people I played it with knew it was sh*t. But it was good sh*t, it had substance, glitches that you would laugh off and even though deep down you knew this was really sh*t; it was fun. You have one glitchy game in 10 and its fun. But when you start running into these problems every game, its not as easy to just laugh off. I think there was a shared sense of normalising the glitches as BHVR being BHVR; but having barely touched this game since January and looking at my old YouTube videos for a sense of nostalgia I can sit back and think what the actual fuck. This is a AAA game with licencing agreements with Konami and Netflix ( no longer no wonder ), how can I run into the same heavily documented glitch twice with a span of a year in-between? Its absurd how lazy these developers are and it shows, instead of focusing on making this game playable they focused on new content which lulled me, and my friends into acceptance for a while because who the fuck doesn't want to play as the demogorgon in your favourite game? It was an exciting community and game to play that had nowhere to go but up and don't get me wrong, probably still is! I just don't feel the same sense anymore. Crossplay was one of the most exciting features they were going to implement for the longest time and as soon as they did communication in the game died. This games end game chat was so much more important at creating a tight knit experience than most people realise; I remember many occasions talking to the survivors/killers for 5-10 mins until the chat would get closed and I'd add them on steam. You would feel a sense of relief after you completely body the survivors in 2 minutes after they say good game and compliment your playing. The new graphics SUCK I absolutely despise them WHAT the fuck are the current character icons the maps look BLAND and as if they have just stuck post processing and saturation on everything the art direction has gone through the floor I could go on for hours how this game has just plummeted in its sense of self. This game does not feel like this game anymore.

**

Polecam tą grę ze względu na ułomność niektórych survivorów którzy grają tylko pod siebie. Jeżeli jesteś mainem killera to masz zajebiście, o ile nie zaczną cię na końcu wyzywać. Do tego jednak radzę się przyzwyczaić, ponieważ na tym zbudowane jest to całe wspaniałe community. Natomiast jeśli wolisz grać solo survem to lepiej znajdź sobie kolegów, albo przygotuj się na kolejną dawkę wkurwienia i załamania nerwowego.

Очень весёлая игра если собирать фулл пати.) НО если ты играешь соло, то у тебя 3 имбицила которые не чинят генераторы, ты бегаешь от убийцы 15 минут они дают за этот промежуток времени 0 генов, а если ты садишься чинить гены, они ложаться за 15 минут ВСЕ, если ты бегаешь, чинишь, спасаешь всю игру тебе не дают каплю, очень плохой подбор между рангами, я могу на убийце 18 ранго попасться против сурвов 1го ранга, и так же за сурвов!

Не возможно начать игру за киллеров,если у вас низкий ранг, большое везение, если ты попадаешь в игру. Смысл покупать дополнения пропадает, зачем они нужны, когда играть нормально не реально, свободное время на другое можно потратить. За сурвов время ожидания минимальное, это всегда радует .

В игре очень сильно смещён баланс в сторону убийц, утрачен эффект соревновательности. Игра очень не стабильна, очень много ошибок. Так же убийцы пользуются чит кодами что делает игру ещё больше не интересной. Рекомендовать игру не могу и не буду

Excelente juego. Soy hispano, pero hablo inglés. Encontrarás a una mayoría de habla inglesa. Pero lo importante es el idioma del gameplay. ME ENCANTA. Demora un poco para encontrar partidas (1 minuto máximo - Eso es mucho para mí. Antes tomaba segundos). Pero es muy balanceado. Si eres nuevo, el matchmaking te hará jugar con jugadores nuevos como tú, del mismo rango que tú.

Wait 10+ for a killer game, get matched with people way better than you, rinse and repeat. "git gud" tea bag tea bag tea bag... yea yea yea... So many games to play out there, don't get bogged down with this one. I tried to collect all of the tome rewards and obtain all of the lore pages... the expectation is that you will suffer through this game for 2+ hours a day if you want to collect all of the rewards and such. I got burned out and found myself playing not for fun, but because I wanted to collect the rewards I paid for and to "git gud." There is also a grind to unlock all of the perks. I am a little more than halfway... good luck...
